reviewText: Arrive on time, excellent item, perfect condition, works excellent.
Not  quite what I was hoping for, but good for what it is.
Great anime overall just wish it came with both dvds but that's ok for the price I got. :) very happy to own the first of these dvds in English just waiting on more to be released.
I will forever and always love this show! Cyborg 009 is definitely something I will never forget from my childhood.

Its ok, but it does show that people don't understand what makes a commander. Everyone thinks they can do a better job until they are in charge. This series is a good example of it. Good for starters in Anime. Another good series for beginners.

I've watched some epis a friend of mine told me to watch then decided to get the dvds. I wish there was more dvds in the english language. Glad to see that they still have few epis on each dvd. Worth watching and those who I told about the series as well love it too.
This is one of the best cartoon I have ever seen, but I am so dissapointed that there is no more episodes. And cartoons like this are very hard to find

I think this series is well worth watching, but you can read the other reviews to help you decide if you are interested.  However, please be aware that Cyborg 009 - The Battle Begins, contains 4 episodes of the series:  episodes 1-4. A second DVD, Cyborg 009 - Good vs Evil, contains episodes 5-8.  The DVD Cyborg 009 - Uncut & Unedited, contains episodes 1-8.  So, you may want to order Uncut & Unedited, and get the 8 instead for just a couple of dollars more!  Apparently these 8 are all that are available at this time.
